26
27#if HAVE_NBTOOL_CONFIG_H
28# include "nbtool_config.h"
29#endif
30
31#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
32
33#include <ctf_impl.h>
34#include <sys/mman.h>
35#include <stdarg.h>
36
37void *
38ctf_data_alloc(size_t size)
39{
40 return (mmap(NULL, size, PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE,
41 MAP_PRIVATE | MAP_ANON, -1, 0));
42}
43
44void
45ctf_data_free(void *buf, size_t size)
46{
47 (void) munmap(buf, size);
48}
49
50void
51ctf_data_protect(void *buf, size_t size)
52{
53 (void) mprotect(buf, size, PROT_READ);
54}
55
56void *
57ctf_alloc(size_t size)
58{
59 return (malloc(size));
60}
61
62/*ARGSUSED*/
63void
64ctf_free(void *buf, __unused size_t size)
65{
66 free(buf);
67}
68
69const char *
70ctf_strerror(int err)
71{
72 return ((const char *) strerror(err));
73}
74
75/*PRINTFLIKE1*/
76void
77ctf_dprintf(const char *format, ...)
78{
79 if (_libctf_debug) {
80 va_list alist;
81
82 va_start(alist, format);
83 (void) fputs("libctf DEBUG: ", stderr);
84 (void) vfprintf(stderr, format, alist);
85 va_end(alist);
86 }
87}
88
